name: Sendsms
tagline: Send SMS messages using CS Networks Mobiile Messaging API
body:
Send SMS using [CS Networks](http://www.cs-networks.net) messaging API
===============================================
Usage:
sendsms {-f bulkfile|-d recipient} [-u username] [-p password] [-s sourceaddr ] [-r] message

-f bulkfile   - File with destination number on each line
-d recipient  - Destination number
-u username   - Service username
-p password   - Service password
-s sourceaddr - Source number
-r            - Request Delivery Report
message - text to send to the destination number (required)

You must specify either bulkfile or recipient.
Service username is required.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
